Uses of Class
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.game.RenderedCard

Packages that use RenderedCard
Package
Description
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions
Classes in this package are in charge of passing information based on user-input gathered from the view to the model, while making sure to keep these two levels independent of each other
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.game
Contains the components that are specific to the ingame scene.

  • Uses of RenderedCard in fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions

    Field
    Description
    private List<RenderedCard>
    CardSelectorController.jList
    The list of RenderedCard covered by this controller.
    private Map<RenderedCard,MouseListener>
    CardSelectorController.thisControllersMLMap
    This map associates, to each RenderedCard covered by this controller, one MouseListener.
    Constructor parameters in fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions with type arguments of type RenderedCard
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    CardSelectorController(List<RenderedCard> jList, GamePanel gp)
    With this constructor, this controller is not used for making a choice and transfer it to the model : it is only used to display a card as selected, interacting only with the GUI view.
     
    CardSelectorController(List<RenderedCard> jList, GamePanel gp, InputMediator im)
    With this constructor, this controller is used for making a choice and transfer it to the model using directly their pictures instead of a menu made of buttons.
